description: The prehensile tongue of the Spinalgohma can be grown to great lengths. Such specimens can attack from a staggering distance beyond any average spearman.
tooltip: The prehensile tongue of the Spinalgohma can be grown to great lengths. Such specimens can attack from a staggering distance beyond any average spearman. (Spinalgohma's attack range increased by 60% and attack speed by 10%)
